snippet.title: Asterix & Obelix : Cesar's Challenge
snippet.description:
The best Asterix & Obelix XXL Mod yet! Now with a complete new level, enemies and, most important of all, a fair and fun experience!
Download Link (Password = Asterix): https://drive.google.com/file/d/1b8aSOmq7aB2OwYUeDgSfOoAabW4d3jub
Installation instructions are in the README.txt, no original game needed! Just unzip and play!

Discord: https://discord.gg/G2EwU9nYDw

After the infamous Unfair XXL, it's time for the ultimate Asterix & Obelix XXL mod! An entire new level, 14 new enemies and over 12 hours of guaranteed madness! Cesar has captured a Gaulish druid and is now utilizing him to create super soldiers! The destiny of Gaul's independence now lies in the hands of Asterix & Obelix, who will need to fight their way through to his palace and confront the undefeated emperor!

-- Credits --
Mod made by S.P.Q.R
XXL Editor: AdrienTD ( Check out his editor: https://github.com/AdrienTD/XXL-Editor )
Testing: Asterix Gaming Guild

Thanks to everyone who played my previous mods, be it Unfair XXL or Unfair XXL 2.0. You should absolutely check out JonasZockt's Playthrough of it (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLR2yA2wvcGIwcVi7dPD1KQjVzojh1g-gA), as well as Braixies Unfair XXL 2.2 Walkthrough (https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLFOzDY18RuKbtcLiBgw1pFCBVLfomhdSW), which also showcases all the laurel locations! ❤

Have fun playing the mod and good luck!
